title: eyeyfinity/surround HUD update?
body: so as you can see in the screenshot it looks AMASE BALLS. however. minimap in all the way in the bottom right. gonna be real hard to see. to my knowledge there is 0 way to have everything on the middle screen and have the other 2 just for visual. it used to be possible i believe. anyone got any suggestions? it just looks so good.{{champion:43}}
